ACE inhibitor or Angiotensin Receptor Blocker?--- Arterial Hypertension ?:;;;
Age au recrutement:--- Anticoagulants?:;;;
Anticoagulants?--- HGO or insulin?:;;;
Asthma ?--- Long Covid:;;;

Long Covid--- Age au recrutement::;;;
Long Covid--- If a screening test for SARS-CoV-2 by PCR was performed, what is the most severe severity level (according to WHO) achieved?:;;;
